original: Anavaññattipaṭisaṁyutto vitakko, lābhasakkārasilokapaṭisaṁyutto vitakko, parānuddayatāpaṭisaṁyutto vitakko.
analyzed: ▁ana va ññ at ti paṭisaṃyutt o ▁vitakk o ▁lābhasakkār asi lok a paṭisaṃyutt o ▁vitakk o ▁par ānu d day atā paṭisaṃyutt o ▁vitakk o
▁ana va ññ at ti saṃ yutto
▁p hu ṭṭh uṃ ▁sam bodhi mutt am anti

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
